SCM_ENABLEINTERACTION.name: SCM_ENABLEINTERACTION
SCM_ENABLEINTERACTION.comment: info->param2 - Id of string shown to player

SCM_RADIOCOM.name: SCM_RADIOCOM
SCM_RADIOCOM.comment: starts or ends radio communication - playing of anim

SCM_NEWCOMMANDER.name: SCM_NEWCOMMANDER
SCM_NEWCOMMANDER.comment: param2 is memberid of new group commander

SCM_GOTO.name: SCM_GOTO
SCM_GOTO.comment: param2 = id specifying where to go

SCM_CANUSEMAP.name: SCM_CANUSEMAP
SCM_CANUSEMAP.comment: param2 = id specifying which speech to say

SCM_HELIIN.name: SCM_HELIIN
SCM_HELIIN.comment: message to player's team - enter heli

SCM_HELIOUT.name: SCM_HELIOUT
SCM_HELIOUT.comment: message to player's team - leave heli

SCM_FIRE.name: SCM_FIRE
SCM_FIRE.comment: e.g. when we need mortar-team to work

SCM_RECOVER.name: SCM_RECOVER
SCM_RECOVER.comment: ressurection of player, param2 - if FALSE, player is recovered immediately, otherwise he is not recovered until he is in player's view

SCM_HELILOADED.name: SCM_HELILOADED
SCM_HELILOADED.comment: heli is full, all members in

SCM_MORTARPLACED.name: SCM_MORTARPLACED
SCM_MORTARPLACED.comment: mortar infantry reports it's on the deignated place

SCM_MP_REINIT.name: SCM_MP_REINIT
SCM_MP_REINIT.comment: used in cooperative for AI reinit

SGI_MISSIONDEATHCOUNT.name: SGI_MISSIONDEATHCOUNT
SGI_MISSIONDEATHCOUNT.comment: stores count of death enemy in mission

SGI_TEAMDEATHCOUNT.name: SGI_TEAMDEATHCOUNT
SGI_TEAMDEATHCOUNT.comment: teammates deathcount (right now including wounded too)

SGI_GROUPDEATHCOUNT.name: SGI_GROUPDEATHCOUNT
SGI_GROUPDEATHCOUNT.comment: deathcount of one specific important group

SGI_C4COUNT.name: SGI_C4COUNT
SGI_C4COUNT.comment: for missions, where it's possible use C4 on multiple places		- usable only for singleplayer!!!!

SGI_INTELBASE.name: SGI_INTELBASE
SGI_INTELBASE.comment: 2000-2080 reserved for intel status in level

SGI_INTELCOUNT.name: SGI_INTELCOUNT
SGI_INTELCOUNT.comment: number of intel in the game

SC_COMPLETEINTELCOUNT.name: SC_COMPLETEINTELCOUNT
SC_COMPLETEINTELCOUNT.comment: number of intel's in the game

PLAYER_AMMOLAST.name: PLAYER_AMMOLAST
PLAYER_AMMOLAST.comment: 30 gv reserved for campaing mode - ammo

PLAYER_FREESLOT.name: PLAYER_FREESLOT
PLAYER_FREESLOT.comment: player has nothing in this slot

SGI_ARRIVAL_HORNSTERSPECANI.name: SGI_ARRIVAL_HORNSTERSPECANI
SGI_ARRIVAL_HORNSTERSPECANI.comment: Medic Patrol setting  - is player driving the jeep?

SGI_LEVPILOT_JUSTLOADEDVALUE.name: SGI_LEVPILOT_JUSTLOADEDVALUE
SGI_LEVPILOT_JUSTLOADEDVALUE.comment: defines for Big Valley Chopper flight

SGI_DOLOOP.name: SGI_DOLOOP
SGI_DOLOOP.comment: informs heli that should do loop

SGI_HELIATEND.name: SGI_HELIATEND
SGI_HELIATEND.comment: if TRUE, Heli01 goes for US_0

SGI_MINDEAD.name: SGI_MINDEAD
SGI_MINDEAD.comment: when minometcici are dead, set to TRUE

SGI_SENDATTDONE.name: SGI_SENDATTDONE
SGI_SENDATTDONE.comment: if TRUE, vc_wps can send SCM_ATTACKDONE

FPVANIM_TRAPDISARM.name: FPVANIM_TRAPDISARM
FPVANIM_TRAPDISARM.value: SC_Log(3,"Trying to play disarm trap anim");

CAMPAIGN_GUN.name: CAMPAIGN_GUN
CAMPAIGN_GUN.comment: player script generates weapon according to the mission
